history.proof: intros d hd tl H. apply sem_listes_0 in H. contradiction.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (d : preDTA) (hd : term) (tl : term_list), ~ liste_reconnait d prec_empty (tcons hd tl)

Premises:
Inductive reconnaissance : preDTA -> ad -> term -> Prop := rec_dta : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state), MapGet state d a = Some ladj -> state_reconnait d ladj t -> reconnaissance d a t with state_reconnait : preDTA -> state -> term -> Prop := rec_st : forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (c : ad) (tl : term_list) (l : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s c = Some l -> liste_reconnait d l tl -> state_reconnait d s (app c tl) with liste_reconnait : preDTA -> prec_list -> term_list -> Prop := rec_empty : forall d : preDTA, liste_reconnait d prec_empty tnil | rec_consi : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list) (hd : term) (tl : term_list), reconnaissance d a hd -> liste_reconnait
Inductive prec_list : Set := prec_cons : ad -> prec_list -> prec_list -> prec_list | prec_empty : prec_list
preDTA = Map state : Set
Inductive term : Set := app : ad -> term_list -> term with term_list : Set := tnil : term_list | tcons : term -> term_list -> term_list
sem_listes_0 : forall (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) (hd : term) (tl : term_list), liste_reconnait d p (tcons hd tl) -> p <> prec_empty
rec_consn : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list) (hd : term) (tl : term_list), liste_reconnait d ls (tcons hd tl) -> liste_reconnait d (prec_cons a la ls) (tcons hd tl)
rec_consi : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list) (hd : term) (tl : term_list), reconnaissance d a hd -> liste_reconnait d la tl -> liste_reconnait d (prec_cons a la ls) (tcons hd tl)
liste_reconnait_ind : forall P : preDTA -> prec_list -> term_list -> Prop, (forall d : preDTA, P d prec_empty tnil) -> (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list) (hd : term) (tl : term_list), reconnaissance d a hd -> liste_reconnait d la tl -> P d la tl -> P d (prec_cons a la ls) (tcons hd tl)) -> (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list) (hd : term) (tl : term_list), liste_reconnait d ls (tcons hd tl) -> P d ls (tcons hd tl) -> P d (prec_cons a la ls) (tcons hd tl)) -> forall (p : preDTA) (p0 : prec_list) (t : term_list), liste_reconnait p p0 t -> P p p0 t
Inductive reconnaissance : preDTA -> ad -> term -> Prop := rec_dta : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state), MapGet state d a = Some ladj -> state_reconnait d ladj t -> reconnaissance d a t with state_reconnait : preDTA -> state -> term -> Prop := rec_st : forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (c : ad) (tl : term_list) (l : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s c = Some l -> liste_reconnait d l tl -> state_reconnait d s (app c tl) with liste_reconnait : preDTA -> prec_list -> term_list -> Prop := rec_empty : forall d : preDTA, liste_reconnait d prec_empty tnil | rec_consi : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list) (hd : term) (tl : term_list), reconnaissance d a hd ->...-> liste_reconnait d (prec_cons a la ls) (tcons hd tl)
conservation_3 : forall (d : preDTA) (hd : term) (tl : term_list) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list), S (essence_list (tcons hd tl) d ls) <= essence_list (tcons hd tl) d (prec_cons a la ls)
conservation_5 : forall (d : preDTA) (hd : term) (tl : term_list) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list), S (essence hd d) <= essence_list (tcons hd tl) d (prec_cons a la ls)
conservation_4 : forall (d : preDTA) (hd : term) (tl : term_list) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list), S (essence_list tl d la) <= essence_list (tcons hd tl) d (prec_cons a la ls)
mlrec_ind : forall (P : forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance p a t -> Prop) (P0 : forall (p : preDTA) (s : state) (t : term), state_reconnait p s t -> Prop) (P1 : forall (p : preDTA) (p0 : prec_list) (t : term_list), liste_reconnait p p0 t -> Prop), (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state) (e : MapGet state d a = Some ladj) (s : state_reconnait d ladj t), P0 d ladj t s -> P d a t (rec_dta d a t ladj e s)) ->...-> forall (p : preDTA) (p0 : prec_list) (t : term_list) (l : liste_reconnait p p0 t), P1 p p0 t l
mreconnaissance_ind : forall (P : forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance p a t -> Prop) (P0 : forall (p : preDTA) (s : state) (t : term), state_reconnait p s t -> Prop) (P1 : forall (p : preDTA) (p0 : prec_list) (t : term_list), liste_reconnait p p0 t -> Prop), (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state) (e : MapGet state d a = Some ladj) (s : state_reconnait d ladj t), P0 d ladj t s -> P d a t (rec_dta d a t ladj e s)) ->...-> forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (r : reconnaissance p a t), P p a t r
mstrec_ind : forall (P : forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance p a t -> Prop) (P0 : forall (p : preDTA) (s : state) (t : term), state_reconnait p s t -> Prop) (P1 : forall (p : preDTA) (p0 : prec_list) (t : term_list), liste_reconnait p p0 t -> Prop), (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state) (e : MapGet state d a = Some ladj) (s : state_reconnait d ladj t), P0 d ladj t s -> P d a t (rec_dta d a t ladj e s)) ->...-> forall (p : preDTA) (s : state) (t : term) (s0 : state_reconnait p s t), P0 p s t s0
tlo_head : forall (t hd : term) (tl : term_list), term_occur t hd -> term_list_occur t (tcons hd tl)
tlo_tail : forall (t hd : term) (tl : term_list), term_list_occur t tl -> term_list_occur t (tcons hd tl)
term_list_disj : forall l : term_list, l = tnil \/ (exists (hd : term) (tl : term_list), l = tcons hd tl)
Inductive term_occur : term -> term -> Prop := to_eq : forall t : term, term_occur t t | to_st : forall (t : term) (a : ad) (tl : term_list), term_list_occur t tl -> term_occur t (app a tl) with term_list_occur : term -> term_list -> Prop := tlo_head : forall (t hd : term) (tl : term_list), term_occur t hd -> term_list_occur t (tcons hd tl) | tlo_tail : forall (t hd : term) (tl : term_list), term_list_occur t tl -> term_list_occur t (tcons hd tl)
term_list_occur_ind : forall P : term -> term_list -> Prop, (forall (t hd : term) (tl : term_list), term_occur t hd -> P t (tcons hd tl)) -> (forall (t hd : term) (tl : term_list), term_list_occur t tl -> P t tl -> P t (tcons hd tl)) -> forall (t : term) (t0 : term_list), term_list_occur t t0 -> P t t0
rec_st : forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (c : ad) (tl : term_list) (l : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s c = Some l -> liste_reconnait d l tl -> state_reconnait d s (app c tl)
conservation_1 : forall (d : preDTA) (l : term_list), 1 <= essence_list l d prec_empty
high_aux_4 : forall (t : term) (tl : term_list), term_high_0 tl <= term_high_0 (tcons t tl)
high_aux_3 : forall (t : term) (tl : term_list), term_high t <= term_high_0 (tcons t tl)
rec_empty : forall d : preDTA, liste_reconnait d prec_empty tnil
to_st : forall (t : term) (a : ad) (tl : term_list), term_list_occur t tl -> term_occur t (app a tl)
state_reconnait_ind : forall P : preDTA -> state -> term -> Prop, (forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (c : ad) (tl : term_list) (l : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s c = Some l -> liste_reconnait d l tl -> P d s (app c tl)) -> forall (p : preDTA) (s : state) (t : term), state_reconnait p s t -> P p s t
conservation_0 : forall (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) (c : ad) (l : term_list), prec_in_dta d p -> S (essence_list l d p) <= essence (app c l) d
rec_dta : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state), MapGet state d a = Some ladj -> state_reconnait d ladj t -> reconnaissance d a t
borne_2 : forall (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list), prec_in_dta d p -> taille_0 p <= DTA_taille d
borne_1 : forall (d : preDTA) (s : state), state_in_dta d s -> taille_1 s <= DTA_taille d
reconnaissance_ind : forall P : preDTA -> ad -> term -> Prop, (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state), MapGet state d a = Some ladj -> state_reconnait d ladj t -> P d a t) -> forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance p a t -> P p a t
conservation_2 : forall (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list), 1 <= essence_list tnil d p
term_list_rec : forall P : term_list -> Set, P tnil -> (forall (t : term) (t0 : term_list), P t0 -> P (tcons t t0)) -> forall t : term_list, P t
term_list_rect : forall P : term_list -> Type, P tnil -> (forall (t : term) (t0 : term_list), P t0 -> P (tcons t t0)) -> forall t : term_list, P t
term_list_ind : forall P : term_list -> Prop, P tnil -> (forall (t : term) (t0 : term_list), P t0 -> P (tcons t t0)) -> forall t : term_list, P t
DTA_rec : forall P : DTA -> Set, (forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad), P (dta p a)) -> forall d : DTA, P d
DTA_ind : forall P : DTA -> Prop, (forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad), P (dta p a)) -> forall d : DTA, P d
DTA_rect : forall P : DTA -> Type, (forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad), P (dta p a)) -> forall d : DTA, P d
Refl.not_make_conj_app : forall (A : Type) (t a : list A) (eval : A -> Prop), (forall d : A, eval d \/ ~ eval d) -> ~ Refl.make_conj eval (t ++ a) -> ~ Refl.make_conj eval t \/ ~ Refl.make_conj eval a
rec_list_terms = fix rec_term (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (n : nat) {struct n} : bool := match n with | 0 => false | S k => match t with | app c l => match MapGet state d a with | Some lts => match MapGet prec_list lts c with | Some pre => rec_list_terms d pre l k | None => false end | None => false end end end with rec_list_terms (d : preDTA) (pre : prec_list) (l : term_list) (n : nat) {struct n} : bool := match n with | 0 => false | S k => match pre with | prec_cons st stp pre' => match l with | tnil => false | tcons hd tl => rec_list_terms d pre' l k || rec_term d st hd k && rec_list_terms d stp tl k end | prec_empty => match l with | tnil => true | tcons _ _ => false end end end for rec_list_terms : preDTA ->...-> bool Argument scopes are [_ _ _ nat_scope]
rec_term = fix rec_term (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (n : nat) {struct n} : bool := match n with | 0 => false | S k => match t with | app c l => match MapGet state d a with | Some lts => match MapGet prec_list lts c with | Some pre => rec_list_terms d pre l k | None => false end | None => false end end end with rec_list_terms (d : preDTA) (pre : prec_list) (l : term_list) (n : nat) {struct n} : bool := match n with | 0 => false | S k => match pre with | prec_cons st stp pre' => match l with | tnil => false | tcons hd tl => rec_list_terms d pre' l k || rec_term d st hd k && rec_list_terms d stp tl k end | prec_empty => match l with | tnil => true | tcons _ _ => false end end end for rec_term : preDTA -> ad -> term ->...-> bool Argument scopes are [_ _ _ nat_scope]
term_occur_ind : forall P : term -> term -> Prop, (forall t : term, P t t) -> (forall (t : term) (a : ad) (tl : term_list), term_list_occur t tl -> P t (app a tl)) -> forall t t0 : term, term_occur t t0 -> P t t0
essence = fun (t : term) (d : preDTA) => S (term_high t) * S (DTA_taille d) : term -> preDTA -> nat

``` 
intros d hd tl H.
unfold not; intros contra.
apply contra.
apply sem_listes_0 in H.
contradiction.
```

original: intros d hd tl H. unfold not; intros contra. apply contra. apply sem_listes_0 in H. contradiction.
